name: Lucky Wheel: Lucky Color
description:
Lucky Wheel Lucky Color - Please choice correct color


Simply tap the screen to match the dial with the correct color.

You had a simple and addicting game on your phone to keep yourself occupied? Well here it is!
Challenge your family and friends to beat your spinny high score. Good luck and go have fun!

It is totally free of charge and you have no doubt to make use of this resources to make your lifestyle interesting.

Thank for play Lucky Wheel Lucky Color
